text: There's no function for a list of blogs is there (outside of using the API) ?
I'm thinking about something like {{ blogs }} that returns a list of {{group}} objects
similar to how we would get {{ blog_topics}} for whatever {{ group }} we're currently on

So if I wanted to have a landing page that included a dynamic list of links to the various blogs on the site (ex: <http://example.com/blog1|example.com/blog1> , <http://example.com/blog2|example.com/blog2>, etc) currently, it seems I would have to hard-code it or use a menu structure and add the blogs to the menu
It'd be nice to be able to loop through the {{ group }} objects that are returned and be able to use all of the available {{ group}} variables like {{group.id}} {{group.name}} {{group.header}} etc...

Hey Jeff, so i am trying to use:
```
<img src="{{ resize_image_url(content.blog_post_author.avatar, 50, 50) }}" alt="{{ content.blog_post_author.display_name }}">
```
and its not generating the author avatar at 50x50 its simply showing the standard size
it doesnt seem to resize or append info to anything, even when i use the above example (putting 50 in place of the zeros). i still just get the URL with no params
Matt is looking into a similar image resizing issue for me and this could be the same or similar issue
Also, I know the code was posted before but I cant seem to find it. How do you go about getting the "Read Time" like on the HS Blog
